roleset.name: apply pressure, pressure someone to do something

example.name: with goal
example.text: Big Board stock specialists, began to have them pressure the exchange to ban program trading.

example.name: without goal
example.text: Generally in the quarter, overproduction of gasoline and higher crude oil prices pressured profitability.
example.arg: overproduction of gasoline and higher crude oil prices

roleset.name: move, cause motion by pressure
roleset.note: PRESSURE-V NOTES: No corresponding VN class for movement sense. (from pressure.02-v)

example.name: somewhat odd usage
example.text: [The Nikkei index]-1 was pressured *trace*-1 down by profit-taking triggered by sharp advances made through this week and fell 151.20 points to 35527.29.
example.arg: by profit-taking triggered by sharp advances made through this week
